snippet: On Sunday afternoons when it carries National Football League games, the network will start its prime-time schedule a half-hour later, providing some relief to DVR users who have missed their favorite shows.
abstract: On Sunday afternoons when it carries National Football League games, the network will start its prime-time schedule a half-hour later, providing some relief to DVR users who have missed their favorite shows.

headline.main: CBS Adjusts Schedule to Account for Longer N.F.L. Games
